statements: SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE id = 2;
SELECT query_text FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, query_text FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE id IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE query_text LIKE '%Injection%';
SELECT id, query_text FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE id = 1;
SELECT query_text, id FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE query_text LIKE '%attack%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, query_text FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE query_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, query_text FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE id IN (3, 7, 9) OR query_text LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, query FROM sql_queries;
SELECT query, id FROM sql_queries;
SELECT query FROM sql_queries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sql_queries WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, query FROM sql_queries ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sql_queries WHERE id = 1;
SELECT query FROM sql_queries ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, query FROM sql_queries WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM blocked_queries WHERE reason = 'spam' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sql_queries;
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Attacks WHERE attack_detected = true
SELECT id, query_text FROM SQL_Injection_Attacks ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM SQL_Analysis_Logs WHERE analysis_timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT query_id, analysis_result FROM SQL_Analysis_Logs ORDER BY query_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Blocked_Queries WHERE block_reason LIKE '%malicious%'
SELECT * FROM SQL_Injection_Attacks WHERE attack_detected = TRUE ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT query_text, attack_detected FROM SQL_Injection_Attacks WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 100 ORDER BY id;
SELECT query_text, block_reason FROM SQL_Injection_Attacks AS a JOIN Blocked_Queries AS b ON a.id = b.id WHERE b.block_reason = 'SQL Injection';

SELECT a.query_text, b.analysis_result FROM SQL_Injection_Attacks AS a INNER JOIN SQL_Analysis_Logs AS b ON a.id = b.query_id WHERE b.analysis_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY b.analysis_timestamp DESC;
SELECT a.query_text AS Query, b.blocked_query_text AS Blocked_Query FROM SQL_Injection_Attacks AS a LEFT JOIN Blocked_Queries AS b ON a.id = b.id ORDER BY b.id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sql_injection_attacks;
SELECT query, detected FROM blocked_queries WHERE blocked_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, query, user_id FROM query_logs ORDER BY executed_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM whitelist_queries WHERE added_by = 123 ORDER BY added_at ASC;
SELECT id, query FROM sql_injection_attacks WHERE detected = true;
SELECT id, query, detected FROM sql_injection_attacks
SELECT id, query, blocked_at, reason FROM blocked_queries WHERE blocked_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT query, user_id, executed_at FROM query_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY executed_at DESC
SELECT id, query, added_by, added_at FROM whitelist_queries WHERE added_by = 456 ORDER BY added_at ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT COUNT(id) AS num_attacks FROM sql_injection_attacks WHERE detected = true
SELECT * FROM User_Queries WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, query FROM SQL_Injection_Detection ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Blocked_Queries WHERE blocked_reason = 'SQL Injection';
SELECT id, analysis_result FROM Query_Analysis_Logs WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%suspicious%';
SELECT pattern_name, example_query FROM Attack_Patterns ORDER BY pattern_name ASC;
SELECT id, query, is_attacked FROM SQL_Injection_Detection ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, query FROM SQL_Injection_Detection WHERE is_attacked = true
SELECT id, query, blocked_reason FROM SQL_Injection_Detection LEFT JOIN Blocked_Queries ON SQL_Injection_Detection.id = Blocked_Queries.query_id
SELECT id, user_id, query FROM User_Queries WHERE user_id = 123 AND query LIKE '%SELECT%'
SELECT id, analysis_result FROM Query_Analysis_Logs WHERE analysis_time > '2022-01-01'
